intro: Bulbophyllum vesiculosum, commonly known as the bubble orchid, is a fascinating epiphytic orchid native to Southeast Asia. It is characterized by its unique, inflated pseudobulbs that store water and nutrients, aiding in its survival in humid, tropical environments.
